task: Find 2 authentic Chongqing hotpot restaurants for dinner

skills_used.error: MCP tool not available in agent context

restaurants.name: 归井老火锅 (Guijing Old Hotpot)
restaurants.address: 天陈路43号(沙坪公园正对面), 重庆市
restaurants.notes: High rating (4.8), authentic old hotpot style, located near Shapingba Park, late night hours (until 2am)

restaurants.name: 春红火锅 (Chunhong Hotpot)
restaurants.address: 临江路28号1-4室, 重庆市
restaurants.special_note: Located near famous Hongyadong scenic area
restaurants.notes: Excellent rating (4.7), prime tourist location near Hongyadong, convenient for sightseeing

alternative_options.name: Yi Er Gu Bai Muslim Chongqing Hotpot
alternative_options.address: 9号雀5号, 中兴路, 渝中区

analysis.location_focus: Tourist areas (Jiefangbei, Hongyadong) and local neighborhoods (Shapingba)

notes: Both restaurants have excellent ratings (4.7-4.8) from Gaode Maps
Both restaurants have identical pricing (89 CNY / $12 USD per person)
春红火锅 (Chunhong) is in prime tourist location near Hongyadong
归井老火锅 (Guijing) offers late-night dining until 2am
